name: Barbell Wrist Curl
description: Strengthens the forearm flexors and improves grip strength.

name: Barbell Wrist Curl Behind the Back
description: Targets forearm flexors and improves grip with an isolated motion.

name: Dumbbell Wrist Curl
description: Builds forearm flexor strength and enhances wrist mobility.

name: Farmers Walk
description: Boosts grip strength and endurance while engaging forearms and shoulders.

name: Gripper
description: Targets hand and forearm muscles to improve grip strength.

name: Plate Pinch
description: Develops grip strength by focusing on pinching strength in the forearms.

name: Plate Wrist Curl
description: Engages forearm flexors with a controlled wrist curling movement.

name: Barbell Wrist Extension
description: Strengthens the forearm extensors for balanced wrist development.

name: Dumbbell Wrist Extension
description: Isolates and builds forearm extensor strength, improving wrist stability.
